          stores game statistics

    • Class boggle.BoggleStats

      class BoggleStats extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cAverageWords
          double cAverageWords
          the average number of words, per round, found by the computer
        • computerWords
          Set<String> computerWords
          set of words the computer finds in a given round
        • cScore
          int cScore
          the computer's score for the current round
        • cScoreTotal
          int cScoreTotal
          the computer's total score across every round
        • pAverageWords
          double pAverageWords
          the average number of words, per round, found by the player
        • playerWords
          Set<String> playerWords
          set of words the player finds in a given round
        • pScore
          int pScore
          the player's score for the current round
        • pScoreTotal
          int pScoreTotal
          the player's total score across every round
        • round
          int round
          the current round being played

          Buttons to start, end, enter and create a new game
        • font
          int font
          Grid size (4 -9). The grid is always a square therefore the size is only an integer. GridButtonSize is the size of the grid buttons Font is the font for the buttons

          BoggleStats gameStats
          Boggle Statistics

          javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid

          ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Button> gridButtons
          This array holds the buttons that have been selected by the game player
        • gridButtonSize
          int gridButtonSize
          Grid size (4 -9). The grid is always a square therefore the size is only an integer. GridButtonSize is the size of the grid buttons Font is the font for the buttons
        • inputWord
          String[] inputWord
          The word the user is typing or selecting from the grid
